Gene.FullName: EARP complex and GARP complex interacting protein 1
family with sequence similarity 110 member C

SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

SampleDescription.Description: maternally inherited unbalanced translocation; sister with small dups at breakpoints. Phenotype: delays, mother with t(2;12)(p25.3;q24.31)

Name.ElementValue: Developmental delay AND/OR other significant developmental or morphological phenotypes

ClinicalAssertion.StudyDescription: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations, with clinical assertions as classified by the original submitter.
